verses.verse: And he <S%G3004>spoke<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them to <S%G3588>this<s%> end, that men <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> to <S%G4336>pray,<s%> and not to <S%G1573>faint;<s%>
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> There was in a <S%G4172>city<s%> a <S%G2923>judge,<s%> which <S%G5399>feared<s%> not <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G1788>regarded<s%> man: <S%G444><s%>
And there was a <S%G5503>widow<s%> in that <S%G4172>city;<s%> and she <S%G2064>came<s%> to him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1556>Avenge<s%> me of <S%G3450>my<s%> adversary. <S%G476><s%>

And he <S%G2309>would<s%> not for a <S%G5550>while:<s%> but afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G1499>Though<s%> I <S%G5399>fear<s%> not <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G1788>regard<s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

<S%G1065>Yet<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> troubles <S%G3930><s%> <S%G2873><s%> me, I will <S%G1556>avenge<s%> her, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> by her continual <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5056><s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> she <S%G5299>weary<s%> me.
And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G191>Hear<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G93>unjust<s%> <S%G2923>judge<s%> said. <S%G3004><s%>

And shall not <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>avenge<s%> his own <S%G1588>elect,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G994>cry<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> and <S%G3571>night<s%> to him, <S%G2532>though<s%> he <S%G3114>bear<s%> <S%G3114>long<s%> with them?

I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you that he will <S%G4160>avenge<s%> them speedily. <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> <S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> when the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> shall he <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the earth? <S%G1093><s%>

And he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3982>trusted<s%> in <S%G1438>themselves<s%> that they were <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> and <S%G1848>despised<s%> <S%G3062>others:<s%>

<S%G1417>Two<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> to <S%G4336>pray;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> a <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> and the <S%G2087>other<s%> a publican. <S%G5057><s%>

The <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> with <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> I <S%G2168>thank<s%> you, that I <S%G1510>am<s%> not as <S%G3062>other<s%> men <S%G444><s%> are, <S%G727>extortionists,<s%> <S%G94>unjust,<s%> <S%G3432>adulterers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as <S%G3778>this<s%> publican. <S%G5057><s%>
I <S%G3522>fast<s%> <S%G1364>twice<s%> in the <S%G4521>week,<s%> I give <S%G586>tithes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> that I possess. <S%G2932><s%>

And the <S%G5057>publican,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> off, <S%G2309>would<s%> not <S%G1869>lift<s%> up <S%G3761>so<s%> <S%G3761>much<s%> as his <S%G3788>eyes<s%> to <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> but <S%G5180>smote<s%> on his <S%G4738>breast,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> be <S%G2433>merciful<s%> to me a sinner. <S%G268><s%>

I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you, <S%G3778>this<s%> man <S%G2597>went<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> to his <S%G3624>house<s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather <S%G2228>than<s%> the <S%G1565>other:<s%> for <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G5312>exalts<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>abased;<s%> and he that <S%G5013>humbles<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

And they <S%G4374>brought<s%> to him <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1025>infants,<s%> that he would <S%G680>touch<s%> them: but when his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, they <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> them.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> them to him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G863>Suffer<s%> <S%G3813>little<s%> <S%G3813>children<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to me, and <S%G2967>forbid<s%> them not: for of <S%G5108>such<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall not <S%G1209>receive<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> as a <S%G3813>little<s%> <S%G3813>child<s%> shall in <S%G3364>no<s%> wise <S%G1525>enter<s%> therein. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G758>ruler<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G18>Good<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5101>Why<s%> <S%G3004>call<s%> you me <S%G18>good?<s%> none <S%G3762><s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> that is, God. <S%G2316><s%>

You <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> Do not <S%G3431>commit<s%> <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> Do not <S%G5407>kill,<s%> Do not <S%G2813>steal,<s%> Do not <S%G5576>bear<s%> <S%G5576>false<s%> <S%G5576>witness,<s%> <S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and your mother.
And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> have I <S%G5442>kept<s%> from my <S%G3503>youth<s%> up.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2089>Yet<s%> <S%G3007>lack<s%> you <S%G1520>one<s%> thing: <S%G4453>sell<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that you <S%G2192>have,<s%> and <S%G1239>distribute<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> and you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> and <S%G1204>come,<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> me.
And when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>this,<s%> he was <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G4036>sorrowful:<s%> for he was <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G4145>rich.<s%>

And when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he was <S%G4036>very<s%> <S%G4036>sorrowful,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1423>hardly<s%> shall they that <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5536>riches<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>

For it is <S%G2123>easier<s%> for a <S%G2574>camel<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G4476>needle's<s%> <S%G5168>eye,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for a <S%G4145>rich<s%> man to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And they that <S%G191>heard<s%> it <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> be <S%G4982>saved?<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> The things which are <S%G102>impossible<s%> with <S%G444>men<s%> are <S%G1415>possible<s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2400>See,<s%> we have <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> you.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, There is <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> that has <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God's<s%> sake, <S%G1752><s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> shall not <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G4179>manifold<s%> <S%G4179>more<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> present <S%G2540>time,<s%> and in the <S%G165>world<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> everlasting. <S%G166><s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> to him the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> we <S%G305>go<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> things that are <S%G1125>written<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> concerning the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> shall be accomplished. <S%G5055><s%>
For he shall be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> and shall be <S%G1702>mocked,<s%> and <S%G5195>spitefully<s%> <S%G5195>entreated,<s%> and <S%G1716>spitted<s%> on: <S%G1716><s%>
And they shall whip <S%G3146><s%> him, and <S%G615>put<s%> him to <S%G615>death:<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> he shall <S%G450>rise<s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

And they <S%G4920>understood<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things: and <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4487>saying<s%> was <S%G2928>hid<s%> from them, <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> they the things which were <S%G3004>spoken.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that as he was <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%> man <S%G2521>sat<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3844>side<s%> <S%G4319>begging:<s%>
And <S%G191>hearing<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G1279>pass<s%> by, he <S%G4441>asked<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> it <S%G1498>meant.<s%>
And they <S%G518>told<s%> him, that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> <S%G3928>passes<s%> by.
And he <S%G994>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> you <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me.

And they which <S%G4254>went<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> him, that he should <S%G4623>hold<s%> his <S%G4623>peace:<s%> but he <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3123>so<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> You <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1138>David,<s%> have <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me.
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> him to be <S%G71>brought<s%> to him: and when he was <S%G1448>come<s%> <S%G1448>near,<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> him,
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> to you? And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that I may <S%G308>receive<s%> my <S%G308>sight.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G308>Receive<s%> your <S%G308>sight:<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> has <S%G4982>saved<s%> you.

And <S%G3916>immediately<s%> he <S%G308>received<s%> his <S%G308>sight,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> him, <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G136>praise<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
